d3fc Visual Tests
  • Source
  • Issues

To seed the random number generator, used to generate the data in some of the tests, a query string can be added to the URL, like this:

?seed=yourseed

Annotation

Line line ohlc

Demonstrates the use of a static line annotation, an updating annotation and animated annotations.

Functional

Decorate bar candlestick decorate ohlc

Tests decorate by performing a simple specialisation on each series type. It also marks the 'origin' of the container which is the parent for each datapoint.

Loading test preview...

Ordinal Axis axis bar line ordinal

Demonstrates the bar series and line series with an ordinal axis.

Loading test preview...

Update bar line ohlc update

A slightly crude test that the series correctly implement the data-join pattern. The series below has points added, removed and updated. A visual inspection of the SVG should show no un-expected elements.

Loading test preview...

Series

Area and Line Interpolation area line

Demonstrates the Area and Line interpolation. Tension only affects the bundle, cardinal, cardinal-open and cardinal-closed interpolations.

Bar bar

A pair of bar series, both rendering the same data with negative values. The top bar has a y0 value set to position it one-third of the way up the chart.
